content: वीत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [वि°इ-क्त] {@--1@} Gone, disappeared. {@--2@} Gone away, departed. {@--3@} Let go, loosed, set free. {@--4@} Excepted, exempt. {@--5@} Approved, liked. {@--6@} Unfit for war. {@--7@} Tame, quiet. {@--8@} Freed from, devoid of (mostly in <ab>comp.</ab>); वीतचिंत, वीतस्पृह, वीतभी, वीतशंक &c. {@--9@} Desired, wished for. {@--10@} Put on or worn --तः An elephant or horse unfit or untrained for war. --तं Pricking (an elephant) with the goad and striking with the legs; वीतवीतभया नागाः <ls>Ku. 6. 39</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> (see <ls>Malli.</ls> thereon); निर्धूतवीतमपि बालकमुल्ललंतं <ls>Śi. 5. 47.</ls>
